headline: How Investors Are Reacting To AppLovin (APP) AI Ad Pivot, Social Network Plans, and SEC Scrutiny
summary: AppLovin reported past fourth-quarter 2025 revenue of US$1,657.94 million and net income of US$1,102.26 million, and issued first-quarter 2026 revenue guidance of US$1,745 million to US$1,775 million while outlining a sharper focus on AI-powered advertising. Alongside these results, the company is pivoting away from its Apps business toward building an AI-driven ad platform, exploring a new social network, and sitting at the center of unconfirmed OpenAI ad-monetization rumors, all under...
